original_text: Because Joseph her husband was faithful to the law, and yet did not want to expose her to public disgrace, he had in mind to divorce her quietly.
korean_text: 그의 남편 요셉은 의로운 사람이라 그를 드러내지 아니하고 가만히 끊고자 하여

sentences.original_text: Because Joseph her husband was faithful to the law
sentences.korean_translation: 요셉은 그녀의 남편이었기 때문에 율법에 충실했습니다

sentences.original_text: and yet did not want to expose her to public disgrace
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그녀를 공개적으로 망신시키고 싶지 않았습니다

sentences.original_text: he had in mind to divorce her quietly
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그녀를 조용히 이혼할 마음을 먹었습니다
